bibl.title: Alexandria and the Moon. An Investigation into the Lunar Macedonian Calendar of Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Prolegomena. - I. Introduction. - II. Patterns of Use of the Macedonian Calendar. - III. The Macedonian Calendar in Alexandria. - IV. The Macedonian New Year After Zenon. - V. bibl.seg: BENNETT Chris, Alexandria and the Moon. An Investigation into the Lunar Macedonian Calendar of Ptolemaic Egypt. (Studia Hellenistica. 52.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., Peeters, 2011, 8°, xxxvi-276 pp., 17 tabl., 7 figg. ISBN 978-90-429-2505-2. €68.
